name: Agatha Christie: Death on the Nile
name_original: Agatha Christie: Death on the Nile
description:
Agatha Christie: Death on the Nile is a game developed by Flood Light Games. It came out on 01-04-2007. It was published by Oberon Media. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Agatha Christie: Death on the Nile on PC.
